2020-10-07-partial type argument inference

auto as a placeholder for locations where you would like inference to occur

just as c++

more todo:

support the constraints between type level programming like:

type Box<T> = { value: T }; type HasBoxedNumber = Box<number>; declare function foo<T extends Box<S>, S>(arg: T): S; declare const hbn: HasBoxedNumber; foo<HasBoxedNumber, infer>(hbn).toFixed();

or more advanced: dependent type
